topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5574d0846368724d13000321#post_5574d0846368724d13000321
I've played 3 or 4 and honestly they don't seem as brutal as I thought they would be. I don't think I've lost a single one. 

I do like the more focused gameplay though. In turf war you could go a whole match without splatting an opponent whereas ranked seems to be a good mixture of covering ground with ink and player combat

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5574d25e6368724d130005c9#post_5574d25e6368724d130005c9
Funimation has made a Show by rock Dub.

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5574a99f63687235cd0003d5#post_5574a99f63687235cd0003d5
[bq="trashboat"]Looking at the wikipedia page for show by rock.

Cyan is being played by Bryn Apprill

And ChuChu by Alexis Tipton

Retoree is played by Caitlin Glass. (Vivi from One piece)

Moa is played by Monica Rial. (Bulma from Kai onwards)

Crow is going to be played by Mike Mcfarland. (Buggy the clown and Master Roshi)

Jerry Jewell is playing Aion. (Nam.)

Ian sinclair is playing Yaiba. (Space Dandy.)

Chris Sabat is playing Rom.

Vic Mignogna is playing Shu Zo.

Riku is being played by Micah Solusod

And Kai is played by Ricco Fajardo[/bq]

Also, Justin Cook is playing Strawberry heart, (Raditz) And Sonny Strait is playing Maple. (Krillin and Usopp)
